devdoc.details: A custom adapter that allows admin to delegatecall `relayTokens` on other adapters by calling `relaySpokePoolAdminFunction` on the HubPool

params.message: Abi-encoded arguments params for the `relayTokens` function call: (address l1Token, address l2Token, uint256 amount, address spokePool)
params.target: Receiver of tokens on the destination chain. SpokePool address passed in by the HubPool
